title: Why am I still single (jomblo) until now? - Quora

response.answer_text: Cause it hurts like hell when you are in relationship with a wrong person or where you are the wrong person. You need to thank god.If you single better, you date better, you marry better and you community better.Know that it's your job to love yourself and make yourself happy, no one else's.Become your own best friend. Enjoy being alone. Understand your needs and wants. Develop your hobbies, skills and mindset. Have a vision and work towards it. Have a full life.Infatuation is blind. Love is a choice. Relationships take work.A relationship requires mutual respect, trust, open communication and two people willing to work on it everyday; accepting their mistakes, apologising and changing their behaviour for better.Fear and insecurities are not the reasons for a relationship. You need self-discipline and patience in all areas.To love is to risk heartbreak.You need to work on yourself before you get into a relationship. P.S. “An idle mind is the devil's workshop.”

I think you're quite shy and you don't know to interest people in you. You should learn how to get interacted with people,in their conversation.  You should watch this and you should follow up the individuals you meet, whether it be a classmate, a person whom you meet at the wedding,etc
